name: Clean Seas Simulator
description:
As you know, #TeamSeas wants to clean 30 million pounds of trash out of the ocean! Let's try and visualize what collecting it all might look like.

It's a very simple, chill and relaxing game. Sit back, control your boat and clean the ocean to the jazzy music made by TKIMUSE.

Either control your boat with WASD or use the actual controls with your mouse. It's all possible! You can also use tab or click on top-left trash count to open the data and upgrade window. You can upgrade several different aspects:

  • Max Speed
  • Acceleration
  • Turn Angle
  • Turning Speed
  • Net Level

And yes, you can change the weight units from metric to imperial.

Try it out and let me know what you think. Also consider donating to #TeamSeas!
